name: Gnome
blurb: Small folk who live underground and posses a talent for magic.
racePowerDesc: Once per battle, when you roll a natural 16+ with an attack, you can also daze the target until the end of your next turn.
passiveDesc: As a standard action, at-will, you can create a strong smell or a sound nearby. Nearby creatures that fail a normal save notice the smell or sound. Creatures that make the save may notice it but recognize it as not exactly real. In addition, you gain a +2 bonus to AC against opportunity attacks.
